description: For high-achieving students pursuing degrees in Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics.
Awarded to students with a proven track record of leadership and community involvement.
Supports talented students in the fields of visual arts, music, theater, and dance.
Financial assistance for students who are the first in their family to attend college.
Encourages and supports women pursuing careers in the tech industry.
For students passionate about environmental science and conservation efforts.
Recognizes students with outstanding commitment to volunteer service.
For students interested in international relations, diplomacy, and global studies.
